alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 5:24PM AKST until December 20 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of light freezing rain occurring. A light glaze of ice is expected. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys. * WHEN...Until 9 PM today. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light freezing are likely. The freezing rain should end about 9pm as a cold front passes through the area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibilities will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
